response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your growth. Our product offers unparalleled value and efficiency, making it a strategic asset for any company looking to streamline processes and increase productivity.

Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, we are offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, providing you with a competitive edge in your industry.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase. We are confident that our product will meet and exceed your expectations, and we look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
